name: The Witch's Wash
description:
Spend a week as a Cuenca Market soap witch!

Throughout the week, find the right soaps to help sad clowns, lonely old ladies, and more!

With each happy customer, collect one more vial of blood to use at the end of the week in your witchy weekend practice. Be careful not to have to give out a refund!

Created by Muulk

Music Credits:

Introduction: Little Town by bart

Gloria Theme: Bossa Nova by Joth

Horatio Theme: Victoriana Loop by Joe Baxter-Webb

Maria Theme: Gone Fishin' by Memoraphile

Ignacio Theme: Jump and Run by bart

Pallaccio Theme: Roll Up by Yubatake

End Theme: Lively Meadow by Matthew Pablo

All Music and SFX were used under CC licenses.
